title: Rules of Bennett
description: Here kitty, kitty, kitty….You can run, but you can’t hide. Before you were born, your father traded your life to secure his. He thought hiding you in another state under a new alias would save you from your awaiting fate, but I always get what’s mine. And it’s time to cash in.While your father paid in blood, you’ll pay with your life; and now you belong to me.My rules are simple.You will bow.You will break. You will obey.Follow them, and you’ll survive. And if you don’t? I will break you in ways that’ll make you wish you were dead.I am Bennett Moreno, devil in the flesh.Welcome to Hell.
author: Ember Michaels
